content: **the boomerang heel is used in this pattern there are no instructions included to work the heel ** pattern refers to the general instruction r0333 1 free for heel and toe and size charts pattern has a 8 stitches repeat no chart given gauge for the checkered pattern size 2 5 3 0 mm needles 30 sts and 45 r/round = 10 x 10 cm **materials** yarn regia 4-fädig uni 100 g ball col 06844 eisblau shiné yarn amounts for size 34/35 to 42/43 1 ball size 46/47 to 48/49 2 balls double pointed needles 2 5 - 3 0 mm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/r0333-regia-sock-guide-sockenlehrgang
